\Gamma(E)=\sum_{s}\delta(E_{s}-E),
italic-S OPEN:( italic-E CLOSE:) RELOP:equals OPFUNCTION:natural-logarithm Gamma OPEN:( italic-E CLOSE:) PERIOD:.
S(E)=\ln\Gamma(E).

math.alttext: {d^{3}\sigma\over dp^{3}_{i}}\propto{1\over E_{i}}\thinspace e^{-E_{i}/T}\int% \prod_{f\neq i}d^{3}p_{f}\thinspace{1\over E_{f}}~{}|{\cal M}|^{2}~{}\exp\left% ({-\sum_{f\neq i}E_{f}/T}\right).
